values.name: thumbnail
values.description: Thumbnail images identify the image to use when displaying products in the Flow Console.

values.name: checkout
values.description: Checkout images identify the item image to use when displaying the item in the context of a consumer checkout (e.g. cart, checkout page).

unit_of_measurement.description: Defines the units of measurement that we support. As units are added, we conform with the standard units provided by jscience as part of JSR 363 - see http://jscience.org/api/javax/measure/unit/SI.html and http://jscience.org/api/javax/measure/unit/NonSI.html

values.name: inch
values.description: A unit of length equal to 0.01004 m (standard name in).

values.name: foot
values.description: A unit of length equal to 0.3048 m (standard name ft).

values.name: cubic_inch
values.description: A unit of volume equal to one cubic inch (in³).

values.name: cubic_meter
values.description: The metric unit for volume quantities (m³).

values.name: gram
values.description: A unit of mass equal to 1 / 1000 kilogram (standard name g).

values.name: kilogram
values.description: The base unit for mass quantities (kg).

values.name: meter
values.description: The base unit for length quantities (m).

values.name: ounce
values.description: A unit of mass equal to 1 / 16 POUND (standard name oz).

values.name: pound
values.description: A unit of mass equal to 453.59237 grams (avoirdupois pound, standard name lb).

item.description: The Flow item defines a specific item that can be purchased by a consumer. For many clients, this will map to a Sku.

fields.name: attributes
fields.description: Attributes of the items. An attribute of type intent must be given as a string representation of a decimal to be correctly localized.

price.description: Represents an amount-currency pair for a basic price

fields.name: currency
fields.description: ISO 4217 3 currency code as defined in https://api.flow.io/reference/currencies

image.description: The URL to an image, with optional tags. Flow Commerce primarily uses images to enhance the administrative tools (e.g. showing an item image in console)

fields.name: url
fields.description: The full URL to the image

fields.name: tags
fields.description: Tags can be used to identify the type of image being sent

item_harmonization.description: Everything we know about an item's harmonization.
